desc: Geeks, liberals, witches, and queers unite behind pithy, punny, progressive pride pins, accessories & clothing for intersectional feminism, trans & LGBTQ rights, and cool retro and spooky designs for hats, mugs, t-shirts, enamel pins, buttons, jewelry and other apparel and home decor for gay pride and your nerdy self.

layout.text:
Accessorizing your identity.
We're a cadre of queer creatives celebrating diversity, equity & inclusion everywhere through pride jewelry & apparel.
Wear YOU with Pride.
